content: {"name": "New Jerusalem Now", "alternate_name": "", "description": "For senior boxes once a month, visit the loction on first week of every month for sign up . \nThee is a shelf where they put non perishable and canned food what they receive from comunity monday through friday 9am to 3pm, Shelf have limited item", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2011 West Norris Street", "address_2": null, "city": "North Philadelphia", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19121", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.9846567, "longitude": -75.1671973}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 763-8806", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Emergency food available. Call to inquire."}]}
